item.title: [HBASE-10420] Replace KV.getBuffer with KV.get{Row|Family|Qualifier|Value|Tags}Array
item.description:
We we start by removing KeyValue.getBuffer() in all obvious places.
Obvious places are where we access the buffer by getRowOffset() and getRowLength(), etc, since we then now we're cross a row/family/qualifier/value/tags boundary.
The attached patch does that.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
